verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>
Now, you son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> will you judge, <WH8199> will you judge <WH8199> the bloody <WH1818> city? <WH5892> yes, you shall show <WH3045> her all <WH3605> her abominations. <WH8441>

Then say <WH559> you, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> The city <WH5892> sheds <WH8210> blood <WH1818> in the middle <WH8432> of it, that her time <WH6256> may come, <WH935> and makes <WH6213> idols <WH1544> against <WH5921> herself to defile <WH2930> herself.

You are become <WH816> guilty <WH816> in your blood <WH1818> that you have shed; <WH8210> and have defiled <WH2930> yourself in your idols <WH1544> which <WH834> you have made; <WH6213> and you have caused your days <WH3117> to draw near, <WH7126> and are come <WH935> even to your years: <WH8141> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> have I made <WH5414> you a reproach <WH2781> to the heathen, <WH1471> and a mocking <WH7048> to all <WH3605> countries. <WH776>
Those that be near, <WH7138> and those that be far <WH7350> from you, shall mock <WH7046> you, which are infamous <WH2931> <WH8034> and much <WH7227> vexed. <WH4103>
Behold, <WH2009> the princes <WH5387> of Israel, <WH3478> every <WH376> one <WH376> were in you to their power <WH2220> to shed <WH8210> blood. <WH1818>

In you have they set light <WH7043> by father <WH1> and mother: <WH517> in the middle <WH8432> of you have they dealt <WH6213> by oppression <WH6233> with the stranger: <WH1616> in you have they vexed <WH3238> the fatherless <WH3490> and the widow. <WH490>
You have despised <WH959> my holy <WH6944> things, and have profaned <WH2490> my sabbaths. <WH7676>

In you are men <WH582> that carry <WH7400> tales <WH7400> to shed <WH8210> blood: <WH1818> and in you they eat <WH398> on the mountains: <WH2022> in the middle <WH8432> of you they commit <WH6213> lewdness. <WH2154>
In you have they discovered <WH1540> their fathers' <WH1> nakedness: <WH6172> in you have they humbled <WH6031> her that was set <WH5079> apart <WH5079> for pollution. <WH2931>

And one has committed <WH6213> abomination <WH8441> with his neighbor's <WH7453> wife; <WH802> and another <WH376> has lewdly <WH2154> defiled <WH2930> his daughter <WH3618> in law; <WH3618> and another <WH376> in you has humbled <WH6031> his sister, <WH269> his father's <WH1> daughter. <WH1323>

In you have they taken <WH3947> gifts <WH7810> to shed <WH8210> blood; <WH1818> you have taken <WH3947> usury <WH5392> and increase, <WH8635> and you have greedily gained <WH1214> of your neighbors <WH7453> by extortion, <WH6233> and have forgotten <WH7911> me, said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Behold, <WH2009> therefore I have smitten <WH5221> my hand <WH3079> at <WH413> your dishonest <WH1215> gain <WH1214> which <WH834> you have made, <WH6213> and at <WH5921> your blood <WH1818> which <WH834> has been <WH1961> in the middle <WH8432> of you.

Can your heart <WH3820> endure, <WH5975> or can your hands <WH3027> be strong, <WH2388> in the days <WH3117> that I shall deal <WH6213> with you? I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it, and will do <WH6213> it.
And I will scatter <WH6327> you among the heathen, <WH1471> and disperse <WH2219> you in the countries, <WH776> and will consume <WH8552> your filthiness <WH2932> out of you.
And you shall take your inheritance <WH2490> in yourself in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen, <WH1471> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>
And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> is to me become <WH1961> dross: <WH5509> all <WH3605> they are brass, <WH5178> and tin, <WH913> and iron, <WH1270> and lead, <WH5777> in the middle <WH8432> of the furnace; <WH3564> they are even the dross <WH5509> of silver. <WH3701>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> you are all <WH3605> become <WH1961> dross, <WH5509> behold, <WH2005> therefore <WH3651> I will gather <WH6908> you into <WH413> the middle <WH8432> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

As they gather <WH6910> silver, <WH3701> and brass, <WH5178> and iron, <WH1270> and lead, <WH5777> and tin, <WH913> into <WH413> the middle <WH8432> of the furnace, <WH3564> to blow <WH5301> the fire <WH784> on it, to melt <WH5413> it; so <WH3651> will I gather <WH6908> you in my anger <WH639> and in my fury, <WH2534> and I will leave <WH5117> you there, and melt <WH5413> you.
Yes, I will gather <WH3664> you, and blow <WH5301> on you in the fire <WH784> of my wrath, <WH5678> and you shall be melted <WH5413> in the middle <WH8432> therof.

As silver <WH3701> is melted <WH2046> in the middle <WH8432> of the furnace, <WH3564> so <WH3651> shall you be melted <WH5413> in the middle <WH8432> thereof; and you shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> have poured <WH8210> out my fury <WH2534> on you.
And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> say <WH559> to her, You are the land <WH776> that is not cleansed, <WH2891> nor <WH3808> rained <WH1656> on in the day <WH3117> of indignation. <WH2195>

There is a conspiracy <WH7195> of her prophets <WH5030> in the middle <WH8432> thereof, like a roaring <WH7580> lion <WH738> ravening <WH2963> the prey; <WH2964> they have devoured <WH398> souls; <WH5315> they have taken <WH3947> the treasure <WH2633> and precious <WH3366> things; they have made her many <WH7235> widows <WH490> in the middle <WH8432> thereof.

Her priests <WH3548> have violated <WH2554> my law, <WH8451> and have profaned <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> things: they have put no <WH3808> difference between <WH996> the holy <WH6944> and profane, <WH2455> neither <WH3808> have they showed <WH3045> difference between <WH996> the unclean <WH2931> and the clean, <WH2889> and have hid <WH5956> their eyes <WH5869> from my sabbaths, <WH7676> and I am profaned <WH2490> among <WH8432> them.

Her princes <WH8269> in the middle <WH7130> thereof are like wolves <WH2061> ravening <WH2963> the prey, <WH2964> to shed <WH8210> blood, <WH1818> and to destroy <WH6> souls, <WH5315> to get <WH1214> dishonest <WH1215> gain. <WH1214>

And her prophets <WH5030> have daubed <WH2902> them with untempered <WH8602> mortar, seeing vanity, <WH7723> and divining <WH7080> lies <WH3576> to them, saying, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> when the LORD <WH3068> has not spoken. <WH1696>

The people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> have used oppression, <WH6233> and exercised robbery, <WH1498> and have vexed <WH3238> the poor <WH6041> and needy: <WH34> yes, they have oppressed <WH6231> the stranger <WH1616> wrongfully. <WH3808> <WH4941>

And I sought <WH1245> for a man <WH376> among them, that should make <WH1443> up the hedge, <WH1447> and stand <WH5975> in the gap <WH6556> before <WH6440> me for the land, <WH776> that I should not destroy <WH7843> it: but I found <WH4672> none. <WH3808>

Therefore have I poured <WH8210> out my indignation <WH2195> on them; I have consumed <WH3615> them with the fire <WH784> of my wrath: <WH5678> their own way <WH1870> have I recompensed <WH5414> on their heads, <WH7218> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
